captions.text:
I'm Bailey and this is Brooklyn
from Brooklyn and Bailey.

And today we're going
to do a Q and A where

we answer all of
your guys' questions
that you want us to answer.

So the first one
we're going to answer

is the most common
question asked for us.

How do you tell the
difference between us two?

-And there's not really
a specific detail

-She's got more of like a
circular face than I do.

-Cuz she was close to
me in my mom's stomach.

-She was up under the rib, so
I was like, ah, I need room.

And she's like all squished
in the ribs and stuff.
So now her face is like that.

Brooklyn does not
like long earrings

because it's just not
part of her personality.

So, always look for those,
and you'll know it's me.

-These are my earrings,
they will never change.

So a lot of guys have been
wondering what kind of videos

we're going to be
doing on our channel.

And since my mom has a
whole like, hair thing,

but we are mostly
going to be doing

-Yeah, silly videos,
vlogs of the family,

So, yeah those are the videos
we'll be doing on our--

-I don't know,
whatever we feel like.

But the next one is,
what's our favorite food?

Our favorite food to eat, both
of us like this, is potatoes.

-You can smell them from a
mile away, they're so good.

The next question is, what
our favorite books are?
I don't have a favorite book.

--that's a hard question,
because we like to read.

-I like sci-fi books, those
are good and I like fantasy.

You know, dragons and
knights in shining armor.

-I think my favorite series ever
is Goose Girl by Shannon Hale.

That series is awesome,
so go check it out.

-It's a good book, well,
a good, how many books?

-I think there's four
books in the series.

-They should say chocolate's
a girl's best friend instead

of diamonds, because
chocolate makes anyone happy,

The next question is,
which one of us is taller?

-I just grew like, an
inch, so now, I'm like,

I don't even know, half
an inch taller than her?

-Maybe next time,
I might be taller.

-When we were
little, I was taller.

And then she was taller when we
were like in fourth grade, now
It'll change in the next month.

-Yeah, and she's also
older, by two minutes.

-So some of our
hobbies are tumbling.

We don't do bars or
anything like that.

And dance, I like
to do dance, too.

-I love to read,
read all the time.

The next on, probably
is like, stores.

What stores we buy
our clothes at.

-Yeah, those are like our
two favorite, top two.

And then Ross, but it's
off and on in that store.

Always have, always
will until I'm married.
Then I won't share a room.

That's weird, don't share
a room when you're married.

-She doesn't like
it, I'm too messy.

-I don't mind sharing a
room, you know, it's OK.

You learn to live with
it when you have a twin.

It's like having a shadow, they
just follow you everywhere.

I like fashion and
doing hair and nails.

And she's more like,
let's go throw footballs--

--and have a water fight
and stuff like that.

-Outdoorsy, I guess, I don't
know what you'd call it.
But, I have some girly traits.
I think that's how you say it.

Do we have like,
telepathic abilities?
and I'll be singing a song--

-At the exact same time,
with the exact same tune.

We'll be like singing
a song, or we'll

-That is what I call
Twin-epathy right there.

-That's about all the questions
that we have for today.

But if you have any more,
just leave the questions

down in the comment
box below so that we

can be able to hear
what you guys want

us to say in our
videos and we will--
